LABEL: 0x362
STRING: What did she say?

LABEL: 0x386
STRING: Yukari's declaration just now...

LABEL: 0x39E
STRING: I was at a loss for words for a moment, unsure of her intentions.

LABEL: 0x3D0
STRING: We couldn't get out of the <SHEEP III>?

LABEL: 0x401
STRING: The power had finally been restored, so why was she giving up on escaping...?

LABEL: 0x449
STRING: 「Why do you say that?」

LABEL: 0x473
STRING: 「Why... should we give up...?」

LABEL: 0x4AD
STRING: She cut me off with an expressionless face.

LABEL: 0x55B
STRING: 「To begin with...」

LABEL: 0x579
STRING: 「This "getting out" you talk about...」

LABEL: 0x5A7
STRING: 「Or, to be precise, "escaping" has long since been impossible.」

LABEL: 0x5E7
STRING: 「The only path left for us was "to wait for someone to come and rescue us"...」

LABEL: 0x698
STRING: 「That's all we've been able to do until now.」

LABEL: 0x6E3
STRING: Until now――

LABEL: 0x701
STRING: She spoke like even that wasn't an option anymore.

LABEL: 0x73B
STRING: 「...Shouldn't we be able to continue holding out until help arrives, even now?」

LABEL: 0x794
STRING: 「No.」

LABEL: 0x7AC
STRING: 「That's all in the past now.」

LABEL: 0x7D6
STRING: 「At this point, even the possibility of help coming for us has been crushed.」

LABEL: 0x8B4
STRING: 「This ship has been abandoned.」

LABEL: 0x8E1
STRING: Those were Reiri's words.

LABEL: 0x901
STRING: The powerful words left behind by that smart girl.

LABEL: 0x925
STRING: Why would Yukari side with her?

LABEL: 0xA4E
STRING: 「...Is this because the communication equipment is destroyed?」

LABEL: 0xA88
STRING: 「Are you stopping your thinking just because of that?」

LABEL: 0xAC6
STRING: 「I'm sure there's still something else we can do――」

LABEL: 0xB64
STRING: 「What are you talking about?」

LABEL: 0xB93
STRING: Yukari interrupted me with a scornful smile.

LABEL: 0xBD1
STRING: I flinched at her expression, which was much like Reiri's.

LABEL: 0xC1C
STRING: 「"Just the communication equipment?"」

LABEL: 0xC3C
STRING: 「"Something else we can do?"」

LABEL: 0xC83
STRING: 「What's so funny?」

LABEL: 0xD11
STRING: 「You're the one who's stopped thinking and is running away.」

LABEL: 0xD4B
STRING: 「You don't understand anything.」

LABEL: 0xD7E
STRING: Her smile froze, and her eyes grew cold.

LABEL: 0xDA8
STRING: She pointed to the communication equipment with its wiring exposed, lying in a state of disrepair.

LABEL: 0xE54
STRING: 「This was our only thread.」

LABEL: 0xE88
STRING: 「What's left for us now that we've lost it?」

LABEL: 0xEDD
STRING: A single thin thread.

LABEL: 0xF01
STRING: A faint connection to the surface.

LABEL: 0xF25
STRING: There was only one meaning to that.

LABEL: 0xF51
STRING: 「There's no other way to contact them...」

LABEL: 0xFEB
STRING: 「Yes, exactly.」

LABEL: 0x100F
STRING: 「There's no way to contact the surface, and there's no way to tell them we're here.」

LABEL: 0x1059
STRING: 「We don't know anything about what's happening on the surface.」

LABEL: 0x1085
STRING: 「The <SHEEP III> has finally become completely isolated.」

LABEL: 0x10C5
STRING: That was her declaration.

LABEL: 0x10DF
STRING: Her tone was strong enough to convince me not to have any hope for us.

LABEL: 0x1121
STRING: Yukari's words echoed in the dark wheelhouse, allowing no rebuttal.

LABEL: 0x1161
STRING: But, I couldn't let us be sealed away here.

LABEL: 0x1197
STRING: 「...You're right that it might be difficult to contact the surface now.」

LABEL: 0x11E1
STRING: 「However, didn't we just make contact with the search party earlier?」

LABEL: 0x122B
STRING: 「Which means that ROMLES should know about us...」

LABEL: 0x1267
STRING: 「If we wait for the rescue ship, eventually――」

LABEL: 0x1305
STRING: 「If you're looking for the rescue ship, it's already here.」

LABEL: 0x1392
STRING: 「...Although it wasn't what I expected.」

LABEL: 0x13C3
STRING: She spoke as if searching for faults in what I had said.

LABEL: 0x13F3
STRING: Like she was sneering at me for not giving up and searching for possibilities.

LABEL: 0x142F
STRING: Yukari's words shattered my faint hopes.

LABEL: 0x14D1
STRING: 「I said they were terrorists just earlier, but...」

LABEL: 0x1517
STRING: 「I believe that whoever came on that ship was a member of ROMLES.」

LABEL: 0x1555
STRING: 「It's ridiculous to even think that the rescue team from ROMLES would be taken over by terrorists.」

LABEL: 0x15AE
STRING: There was a hint of pride in the way she was talking.

LABEL: 0x15F6
STRING: That was why this sense of sadness that clung to her words felt so tragic.

LABEL: 0x1641
STRING: 「That man from ROMLES didn't contact me, despite my presence here.」

LABEL: 0x1695
STRING: 「On the contrary, he spread some sort of soporific smoke inside the ship.」

LABEL: 0x1730
STRING: 「Like they didn't care about me at all...」

LABEL: 0x17FB
STRING: 「There's only one possibility.」

LABEL: 0x182B
STRING: Yukari lowered her eyes and spoke indifferently.

LABEL: 0x1862
STRING: 「ROMLES never had any intention of rescuing us.」

LABEL: 0x18AD
STRING: 「That's...」

LABEL: 0x18C9
STRING: 「There's no way they would abandon us...」

LABEL: 0x1901
STRING: 「There's no way that could happen!!」

LABEL: 0x199B
STRING: 「I wouldn't be so sure.」

LABEL: 0x19D2
STRING: She answered without emotion.

LABEL: 0x19F4
STRING: Without hesitation or discretion, all she did was state the facts plainly.

LABEL: 0x1A3A
STRING: The only emotion I could sense from her was resignation――

LABEL: 0x1A93
STRING: 「But, if that's what ROMLES has decided, then I'm sure it's the right thing to do.」

LABEL: 0x1AFE
STRING: Abandoning us was the right thing to do?

LABEL: 0x1B2E
STRING: Abandoning a sunken submarine, leaving its passengers and crew behind, was the right thing to do?

LABEL: 0x1BEC
STRING: 「It's a decision made by ROMLES――」

LABEL: 0x1C14
STRING: 「And I'm going to follow it.」

LABEL: 0x1C43
STRING: ――What was she talking about?

LABEL: 0x1C65
STRING: I glared at Yukari without thinking, but her expression didn't change at all.

LABEL: 0x1CA5
STRING: Did she understand what she was saying?

LABEL: 0x1CF3
STRING: Was she going to go along with ROMLES, who had justified abandoning us here?

LABEL: 0x1D63
STRING: 「――I don't understand.」

LABEL: 0x1D8B
STRING: 「Why are you being so obedient...?」

LABEL: 0x1DC1
STRING: I felt anger, agitation, doubt, and other indescribable emotions toward Yukari,

LABEL: 0x1E07
STRING: but in the end, that was all I could say to her.

LABEL: 0x1E39
STRING: How could she say those things?

LABEL: 0x1E65
STRING: Why was she giving up?

LABEL: 0x1EF9
STRING: 「We don't have any information.」

LABEL: 0x1F29
STRING: 「The only information we have is from inside this small, closed-off world of the <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x1F70
STRING: 「In which case, whatever's happening on this submarine...」

LABEL: 0x1FB0
STRING: 「Perhaps the people on the surface know better than we do.」

LABEL: 0x2009
STRING: 「What...?」

LABEL: 0x2025
STRING: That was a fair argument.

LABEL: 0x2047
STRING: Correct and cold-blooded logic.

LABEL: 0x2077
STRING: I couldn't deny it... but I couldn't allow it either.

LABEL: 0x20AF
STRING: 「There's no way they'd come to the conclusion of ignoring us.」

LABEL: 0x20FB
STRING: 「They should know that there are survivors down here.」

LABEL: 0x2145
STRING: 「Even if they did, ROMLES operates under the law and can't just abandon living people.」

LABEL: 0x2217
STRING: 「Can you really say that for sure?」

LABEL: 0x224D
STRING: 「It's not a charity. What they do depends on the time and place.」

LABEL: 0x2298
STRING: 「Even if that's the case...」

LABEL: 0x22B8
STRING: 「As long as we're here, there's a chance that help will come sometime――」

LABEL: 0x2362
STRING: 「Like I said!」

LABEL: 0x237C
STRING: 「How many times do I have to tell you?!」

LABEL: 0x23B5
STRING: Her voice turned to anger abruptly.

LABEL: 0x23CF
STRING: Yukari, who had remained calm until now, suddenly raised her voice.

LABEL: 0x2466
STRING: While I was surprised, she gave me a pitying look.

LABEL: 0x24A9
STRING: 「Let me spell it out for you.」

LABEL: 0x24CF
STRING: 「Your "sometime" doesn't exist.」

LABEL: 0x251C
STRING: Saying that, she walked past me and turned on the main computer.

LABEL: 0x256C
STRING: So it wasn't that it wouldn't turn on. It was just turned off...

LABEL: 0x2605
STRING: She hadn't lied about the computer, and dim lights lit up on the many displays.

LABEL: 0x265B
STRING: The wheelhouse was filled with artificial light.

LABEL: 0x268B
STRING: It all felt a bit nostalgic.

LABEL: 0x26C9
STRING: Several numerical figures and graphs were displayed.

LABEL: 0x26F9
STRING: Yukari pointed to one of them.

LABEL: 0x278D
STRING: 「This is the current situation of the power source――」

LABEL: 0x27B7
STRING: 「How much the <SHEEP III> can use, the total amount of power remaining.」

LABEL: 0x27F0
STRING: 「This ship is designed so that once it's charged with hydrogen, it can operate for seven days.」

LABEL: 0x284D
STRING: 「The rear section is submerged, so the power used there can be diverted to the front section.」

LABEL: 0x28A3
STRING: 「Normally, we should be able to hold out for ten days.」

LABEL: 0x28E6
STRING: Even so, ten days at most...

LABEL: 0x2978
STRING: 「However, there are some batteries that are physically damaged.」

LABEL: 0x29C4
STRING: 「Considering that we can't use those anymore, we don't actually have much time left.」

LABEL: 0x2A45
STRING: 「I get what you're saying, Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0x2A77
STRING: 「If we run out of fuel, that will be it...」

LABEL: 0x2AAD
STRING: 「But, it's not like that will be today or tomorrow, right?」

LABEL: 0x2AED
STRING: 「And as long as we can preserve the remaining fuel, we can survive for longer.」

LABEL: 0x2B41
STRING: 「In the meantime, Tokiwa might be able to do something about the damaged batteries.」

LABEL: 0x2B9D
STRING: ...Even though I had said it myself, it sounded like wishful thinking.

LABEL: 0x2BE9
STRING: If everything was left to someone else, there wasn't a shred of persuasiveness to it.

LABEL: 0x2C2D
STRING: But that didn't mean I'd give up without doing anything right now.

LABEL: 0x2C7B
STRING: As long as I could convey my feelings that she was wrong, that was all that mattered.

LABEL: 0x2CCB
STRING: Yukari scratched and shook her head in frustration.

LABEL: 0x2D69
STRING: 「Why won't you understand...?」

LABEL: 0x2DA1
STRING: 「We might be able to alleviate the power supply problem on this ship...」

LABEL: 0x2DDD
STRING: 「But, there's another more serious problem.」

LABEL: 0x2E1C
STRING: 「That's...」

LABEL: 0x2EA4
STRING: 「The <SHEEP III> power system has several independent power supplies in order to keep operating in the case of a disaster.」

LABEL: 0x2F09
STRING: 「Like the elevators and the automatic bulkheads.」

LABEL: 0x2F5F
STRING: 「And, the VDR and onboard cameras for recording information, as well.」

LABEL: 0x2F96
STRING: 「You should know about all three already, right?」

LABEL: 0x2FD4
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x2FFD
STRING: 「There's more than that.」

LABEL: 0x3027
STRING: 「Something else is also powered by them.」

LABEL: 0x3068
STRING: What did she mean...?

LABEL: 0x3088
STRING: It was only natural for a submarine to have its automatic bulkheads connected to a separate power source.

LABEL: 0x3152
STRING: Even if the power wasn't working properly, as long as the bulkheads closed and cut the flow of water, there should be no danger inside the ship.

LABEL: 0x31BA
STRING: And the elevators had an important role as a means of transportation once the bulkheads had activated.

LABEL: 0x3212
STRING: The VDR would be of no use if it didn't operate during a power failure due to its function.

LABEL: 0x3259
STRING: Like the black box on an aircraft, it only played a role in times of emergency... like after an accident like this.

LABEL: 0x32C5
STRING: So, it made sense that they had independent power supplies, but...

LABEL: 0x33C1
STRING: The fact that they were connected to an independent power supply meant that if they were interrupted, it could be fatal.

LABEL: 0x3435
STRING: 「So, what are you getting at...?」

LABEL: 0x34C9
STRING: 「――I'm talking about the heating.」

LABEL: 0x34EB
STRING: 「This ship generates heat in the steam room in the basement.」

LABEL: 0x3525
STRING: 「That steam is then circulated through tubes in the ceiling to provide heating.」

LABEL: 0x35DE
STRING: 「Its power supply is also independent of the rest of <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x3628
STRING: 「The heating...」

LABEL: 0x3646
STRING: I had not expected to hear that word.

LABEL: 0x3668
STRING: 「It'd be one thing if it were winter, but it's summer now. So what about the heating?」

LABEL: 0x36AA
STRING: 「Well, I guess if the air conditioning goes out, it would be inconvenient, but...」

LABEL: 0x3764
STRING: 「As I said!!」

LABEL: 0x37E2
STRING: Yukari sighed.

LABEL: 0x3806
STRING: I could see from her expression alone that she was thinking, "Why do I even have to explain this to you?"

LABEL: 0x3867
STRING: 「There's no summer or winter in the deep sea...」

LABEL: 0x3891
STRING: 「The water temperature is always constant at the bottom of the sea, where sunlight doesn't reach.」

LABEL: 0x38D3
STRING: 「This ship has maintained a comfortable temperature ever since diving, so it's not surprising you wouldn't have noticed.」

LABEL: 0x3943
STRING: 「But that's only because the air conditioning is still functioning normally.」

LABEL: 0x3991
STRING: 「However, once it turns off, we will freeze to death before long.」

LABEL: 0x39EE
STRING: ――I was taken aback.

LABEL: 0x3A0C
STRING: That's right... How could I have forgotten something so obvious?

LABEL: 0x3A4C
STRING: Hadn't she said something before disaster had struck this ship...?

LABEL: 0x3A92
STRING: That the water temperature down here was less than four degrees Celsius.

LABEL: 0x3B06
STRING: 「――And here's how much power the heating system has left.」

LABEL: 0x3B4D
STRING: Yukari pointed to a different display this time.

LABEL: 0x3B7F
STRING: And on it――

LABEL: 0x3B9B
STRING: 「20 hours and 27 minutes...」

LABEL: 0x3BC6
STRING: 「After 20 hours, the heating will run out of power.」

LABEL: 0x3C09
STRING: 「20 hours?!」

LABEL: 0x3C25
STRING: It wouldn't even last a day... Faced with such hopeless estimate, Yukari's expression didn't change.

LABEL: 0x3CDE
STRING: 「――It seems that it was damaged as well.」

LABEL: 0x3D18
STRING: 「So, now you understand why it's pointless to prepare for a long battle.」

LABEL: 0x3D81
STRING: 「You've considered the option of repairing it, right...?」

LABEL: 0x3E23
STRING: 「Yes. Of course.」

LABEL: 0x3E47
STRING: 「I thought Tokiwa-san might be able to do something about it, but...」

LABEL: 0x3E95
STRING: 「If you were to damage the pipes in the steam room,

LABEL: 0x3ED5
STRING: hot steam would fill the area, and you would be steamed to death immediately.」

LABEL: 0x3F6E
STRING: 「Still, I'd consider it if one sacrifice could save the rest of us,

LABEL: 0x3FC2
STRING: but an accident in the steam room could cause damage to the entire ship.」

LABEL: 0x4018
STRING: Still, it was certainly easier said than done.

LABEL: 0x404C
STRING: But how much sense did it make?

LABEL: 0x407E
STRING: Was it realistic? Would it help us in the end? What would it achieve...?

LABEL: 0x40BC
STRING: Was it really possible for us to be saved at all...?

LABEL: 0x4101
STRING: 「It's true that we have food and water.」

LABEL: 0x412D
STRING: 「And even if that creature is here, as long as we wait inside a room, a second or third rescue team might come.」

LABEL: 0x41CA
STRING: 「But we can't wait forever.」

LABEL: 0x4211
STRING: 「Our time limit is 20 hours...」

LABEL: 0x423D
STRING: No, that wasn't the right way to put it.

LABEL: 0x426B
STRING: It didn't mean that whatever we did in the next 20 hours would save us.

LABEL: 0x42AD
STRING: If a rescue team didn't arrive within those 20 hours, we would eventually be doomed to death.

LABEL: 0x42F9
STRING: All that we could do ourselves was――

LABEL: 0x438D
STRING: 「...I'm sorry.」

LABEL: 0x43DD
STRING: 「I couldn't save you.」

LABEL: 0x4409
STRING: 「Not just you, Hiragino-sensei and Tokiwa-san too...」

LABEL: 0x4450
STRING: Her tone was weak, completely different from how irritated she was before.

LABEL: 0x44A0
STRING: Her fluctuating emotions turned into words that filled the room.

LABEL: 0x4552
STRING: 「You might be the one responsible for this accident.」

LABEL: 0x458C
STRING: 「But... I was responsible for bringing everyone back alive.」

LABEL: 0x45EC
STRING: 「I've failed as the chief attendant.」

LABEL: 0x4619
STRING: ――You're wrong.

LABEL: 0x4631
STRING: This wasn't your fault.

LABEL: 0x465F
STRING: There was no doubt it was due to her accomplishments that we had survived as long as we had in this situation.

LABEL: 0x46B6
STRING: So, why did she look so sad?

LABEL: 0x46F2
STRING: Why――

LABEL: 0x470C
STRING: Why was I not able to do anything?

LABEL: 0x473A
STRING: Despite her consideration toward me, the one responsible for this situation,

LABEL: 0x478E
STRING: I couldn't――

LABEL: 0x47AA
STRING: ...Was there really nothing we could do?

LABEL: 0x47DC
STRING: Wasn't there something we had missed?

LABEL: 0x4814
STRING: Wasn't there something else we could do besides wait for rescue?

LABEL: 0x48BD
STRING: 「――What about the diving suits?」

LABEL: 0x48DD
STRING: 「Can't we escape from here using those...?」

LABEL: 0x492B
STRING: 「And die underwater?」

LABEL: 0x49B4
STRING: 「You should know already, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x49E4
STRING: 「They're made extremely heavy so you can walk on the seafloor.」

LABEL: 0x4A85
STRING: 「Those suits aren't capable of much else.」

LABEL: 0x4ABC
STRING: 「Then...」

LABEL: 0x4AD8
STRING: Well then, what else?

LABEL: 0x4AFA
STRING: My next idea was...

LABEL: 0x4B18
STRING: I opened my mouth to say something, but there was nothing.

LABEL: 0x4B64
STRING: No, that wasn't true.

LABEL: 0x4B8A
STRING: There had to be something.

LABEL: 0x4BA8
STRING: Anything――

LABEL: 0x4BCD
STRING: 「I know you're trying to think of ways to escape.」

LABEL: 0x4C11
STRING: 「You're right to do so...

LABEL: 0x4C90
STRING: just like her.」

LABEL: 0x4CCA
STRING: 「However――」

LABEL: 0x4CEB
STRING: A map was displayed in front of Yukari.

LABEL: 0x4D1B
STRING: The state of the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x4D40
STRING: It showed the remaining areas and equipment inside the ship.

LABEL: 0x4DDC
STRING: And then, the radar illuminated the area outside the ship.

LABEL: 0x4E16
STRING: There was nothing there.

LABEL: 0x4E45
STRING: 「In this broken down ship that has been left behind in the depths of the sea...」

LABEL: 0x4E8B
STRING: 「――How is escape possible?」

LABEL: 0x4EE2
STRING: There was nothing I could say in response.

LABEL: 0x4F04
STRING: There was nothing, was there?

LABEL: 0x4F26
STRING: Nothing――

LABEL: 0x4FA3
STRING: ――At that moment.

LABEL: 0x50DC
STRING: 「Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0x50F4
STRING: 「Can't we use... this?」

LABEL: 0x519A
STRING: 「What?」

LABEL: 0x51B7
STRING: She followed my gaze and leaned closer to me.

LABEL: 0x51F5
STRING: And then... she realized it, too.

LABEL: 0x5246
STRING: 「...I completely overlooked it.」

LABEL: 0x52E5
STRING: We dashed out of the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x530F
STRING: Out into the dim and dark-red hallway.

LABEL: 0x5331
STRING: We ran through the corridors.

LABEL: 0x535D
STRING: Our destination was the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x537F
STRING: The lights were completely out, and it was pitch black inside.

LABEL: 0x545B
STRING: 「It's totally dark in here...」

LABEL: 0x548C
STRING: 「Shh――」

LABEL: 0x54AB
STRING: Yukari motioned for silence.

LABEL: 0x54D7
STRING: She whispered into my ear in a low voice.

LABEL: 0x5518
STRING: 「Keep it down.」

LABEL: 0x553A
STRING: 「...I turned off the lights since Hiragino-sensei's sleeping.」

LABEL: 0x5587
STRING: 「Do you have a flashlight?」

LABEL: 0x55A9
STRING: She nodded and turned it on.

LABEL: 0x5640
STRING: We proceeded stealthily to the back of the emergency room, being careful not to wake up Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x568A
STRING: Yukari led the way.

LABEL: 0x56AA
STRING: I followed behind her.

LABEL: 0x56CE
STRING: Our destination was beyond the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x5712
STRING: At the top of the stairs leading to the pressurization chamber――

LABEL: 0x5742
STRING: The door was open, and on the other side was another space.

LABEL: 0x5788
STRING: I could see the hatch in the back.

LABEL: 0x58C5
STRING: There was the shadow that had appeared on the map earlier.

LABEL: 0x58F7
STRING: The possibility that we had now realized.

LABEL: 0x59E8
STRING: 「As I thought, the rescue ship is still there.」

LABEL: 0x5A2F
STRING: 「We might be able to use it.」

LABEL: 0x5A5C
STRING: ――I could see a thin thread.

LABEL: 0x5B8C
STRING: I heard the rustling of clothes from behind me.

LABEL: 0x5BC3
STRING: 「――What is it?」

LABEL: 0x5BE6
STRING: His voice was low and withered. It seemed that he still wasn't feeling well.

LABEL: 0x5C81
STRING: 「Are you... alright?」

LABEL: 0x5CA1
STRING: 「It might be better if you rest...」

LABEL: 0x5CD8
STRING: 「Same to you. Where were you?」

LABEL: 0x5D00
STRING: 「I was worried, but... I'm glad you're safe.」

LABEL: 0x5D33
STRING: Hiragino panted as he talked.

LABEL: 0x5D69
STRING: He did seem to have been sleeping for a long while, but he didn't look fully recovered yet.

LABEL: 0x5DC1
STRING: Maybe it was because he just woke up?

LABEL: 0x5DE5
STRING: I couldn't know for sure...

LABEL: 0x5EE0
STRING: 「You're awake!?」

LABEL: 0x5F0A
STRING: 「You need to get some rest...」

LABEL: 0x5F4F
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x5FC6
STRING: 「No, thanks to you, I was able to rest well. I feel better now.」

LABEL: 0x6005
STRING: Yukari called out to him in concern.

LABEL: 0x602B
STRING: Hiragino placed his hand on her head.

LABEL: 0x6066
STRING: 「Sorry for troubling you, Yukari.」

LABEL: 0x60F6
STRING: 「I-I didn't...」

LABEL: 0x61CA
STRING: 「Anyway, please stop!」

LABEL: 0x61FB
STRING: 「Katagiri-san is watching!」

LABEL: 0x6234
STRING: Should I look away?

LABEL: 0x625A
STRING: That wasn't the problem here.

LABEL: 0x6286
STRING: Yukari tried to remove the hand on her head with both arms.

LABEL: 0x62B8
STRING: I could imagine her blushing as usual, even if I couldn't see it in this darkness.

LABEL: 0x638A
STRING: 「You're so tactless...」

LABEL: 0x6413
STRING: 「This is why you're hopeless, sensei.」

LABEL: 0x6458
STRING: 「I get it, I get it...」

LABEL: 0x647F
STRING: There was none of her earlier dignity left after being teased like this.

LABEL: 0x64BB
STRING: But, the way Yukari acted in front of Hiragino... It wasn't bad at all.

LABEL: 0x6569
STRING: 「By the way, what were you making a fuss about?」

LABEL: 0x659C
STRING: 「Right――」

LABEL: 0x65B8
STRING: 「There might be a way for us to escape, Hiragino-san.」

LABEL: 0x65EE
STRING: 「With the rescue ship here...」

LABEL: 0x664C
STRING: The ROMLES rescue ship.

LABEL: 0x666A
STRING: Actually, we didn't know who it was that came on board.

LABEL: 0x66A4
STRING: Or if they came here to rescue us.

LABEL: 0x66DE
STRING: Still, the ship should still be usable.

LABEL: 0x671A
STRING: At the very least, unlike the <SHEEP III>, it hadn't taken any damage from the accident.

LABEL: 0x676B
STRING: So, if it was usable――

LABEL: 0x686C
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0x688A
STRING: 「I didn't think of using the rescue ship.」

LABEL: 0x68D1
STRING: Hiragino chewed on a xylitol tablet as he spoke.

LABEL: 0x690D
STRING: Somehow, his exhaustion seemed to have faded compared to before.

LABEL: 0x694D
STRING: He staggered to the door leading to the pressurization room and looked up at the end of the stairs.

LABEL: 0x699D
STRING: Inside was the pressurization room and the rescue ship connected to it.

LABEL: 0x6A3B
STRING: 「...Will it work?」

LABEL: 0x6A6C
STRING: 「That's what I'm about to find out.」

LABEL: 0x6B04
STRING: 「How?」

LABEL: 0x6B31
STRING: 「Isn't it obvious?」

LABEL: 0x6B7C
STRING: Yukari stomped her way into the pressurization room.

LABEL: 0x6BA8
STRING: She was concerned about the floor and walls since it was an area you wouldn't normally enter without a diving suit.

LABEL: 0x6C11
STRING: 「Looks all right.」

LABEL: 0x6C37
STRING: 「There's not much space, so wait here, please.」

LABEL: 0x6C84
STRING: 「Yeah, I'll leave it to you.」

LABEL: 0x6CB1
STRING: 「Well, then...」

LABEL: 0x6CD4
STRING: As soon as she said it, Yukari exited the pressurization room and boarded the rescue ship.

LABEL: 0x6D12
STRING: I couldn't see her at all now.

LABEL: 0x6DA4
STRING: 「Heey!」

LABEL: 0x6DBC
STRING: 「How does it look in there?」

LABEL: 0x6DEF
STRING: 「...It's hard to say.」

LABEL: 0x6E11
STRING: 「Honestly, I'm not sure if it'll work...」

LABEL: 0x6E4E
STRING: I could hear her muffled voice from above.

LABEL: 0x6E78
STRING: It sounded like she was talking to herself, but I had no idea what was going on there.

LABEL: 0x6ED6
STRING: ...It felt a bit frustrating.

LABEL: 0x6EF6
STRING: 「Hiragino-san.」

LABEL: 0x6F7C
STRING: 「Hm?」

LABEL: 0x6F97
STRING: 「She'll get mad if I go in without permission, right?」

LABEL: 0x6FDC
STRING: 「Yep.」

LABEL: 0x7051
STRING: 「Well, once you're in there, you're in.」

LABEL: 0x7094
STRING: 「Right.」

LABEL: 0x70AE
STRING: Perhaps this was exactly why Hiragino frustrated Yukari.

LABEL: 0x70EE
STRING: But, I couldn't say I hated his frivolity myself.

LABEL: 0x7136
STRING: 「I'm coming in, Yukari-san...」

LABEL: 0x7160
STRING: It wasn't like I was guilty of anything, but I found myself whispering those words nonetheless as I entered the pressurization room.

LABEL: 0x71BA
STRING: There was no reply... Actually, Yukari probably didn't even hear me.

LABEL: 0x726E
STRING: I looked around the pressurization room I had been to twice already.

LABEL: 0x72AC
STRING: Since I was wearing the diving suit before, I hadn't gotten a good look.

LABEL: 0x7312
STRING: The hatch leading to the rescue ship was open, and beyond it, there was another round-shaped hatch.

LABEL: 0x7380
STRING: Since it was open as well, Yukari must have gone inside.

LABEL: 0x73CA
STRING: I could see red light pouring out from the other side.

LABEL: 0x73FE
STRING: Cold air hit my body as I entered.

LABEL: 0x7445
STRING: 「It's cold!」

LABEL: 0x7471
STRING: 「Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x7492
STRING: As I cried out involuntarily, I alerted Yukari to my presence.

LABEL: 0x74CA
STRING: I had done nothing wrong, but I felt condemned nonetheless...

LABEL: 0x7516
STRING: 「There are some things you won't figure out on your own.」

LABEL: 0x754A
STRING: 「So, let me help you, even if it's a little bit.」

LABEL: 0x7583
STRING: 「...It's cramped, so please be careful.」

LABEL: 0x75BA
STRING: She agreed softly.

LABEL: 0x75DC
STRING: She probably had no reason to refuse now.

LABEL: 0x7606
STRING: I passed through the hatch and entered the ship――

LABEL: 0x76FC
STRING: Yukari was sitting there.

LABEL: 0x771C
STRING: It sure was cramped...

LABEL: 0x7740
STRING: Even Yukari, whose build was slim and slender, didn't have much extra space sitting down.

LABEL: 0x7784
STRING: It was like a perfect fit.

LABEL: 0x77B2
STRING: I see. So this was what her physique was for...

LABEL: 0x77EE
STRING: Very efficient.

LABEL: 0x780A
STRING: She was unmistakably a model chief attendant.

LABEL: 0x783C
STRING: I wondered what kind of face she'd make if I said that out loud.

LABEL: 0x7870
STRING: But, there are times when one must restrain oneself.

LABEL: 0x78FD
STRING: ――I stumbled a bit and bumped into Yukari.

LABEL: 0x799B
STRING: 「Didn't I tell you to be careful?」

LABEL: 0x79E6
STRING: 「S-Sorry...」

LABEL: 0x7A08
STRING: I apologized reflexively.

LABEL: 0x7A36
STRING: After my cursory apology, I shrugged and rubbed my own shoulders.

LABEL: 0x7A96
STRING: 「...I-It's cold.」

LABEL: 0x7AB6
STRING: Abnormally so.

LABEL: 0x7AD2
STRING: Like it was midwinter in here.

LABEL: 0x7AEE
STRING: The reason I was so reserved was because it was a pain to open my mouth in this cold.

LABEL: 0x7B64
STRING: 「Is this... the real temperature of the sea?」

LABEL: 0x7C00
STRING: 「Yes.」

LABEL: 0x7C16
STRING: 「We can't afford to heat even a submarine of this size.」

LABEL: 0x7C69
STRING: Yukari spoke with a composed expression as I was freezing.

LABEL: 0x7C9F
STRING: She looked to be better off with her long-sleeved uniform than me, who was wearing light clothing. The cold didn't seem to affect her at all.

LABEL: 0x7D53
STRING: 「Aren't you cold?」

LABEL: 0x7DDF
STRING: 「I am.」

LABEL: 0x7E07
STRING: 「But, I've been on a submarine of this type before.」

LABEL: 0x7EAC
STRING: 「So I guess you could say I'm used to it.」

LABEL: 0x7ED5
STRING: 「Is that so...?」

LABEL: 0x7EF7
STRING: Was this something you could get used to?

LABEL: 0x7F23
STRING: I held my arms while getting goosebumps.

LABEL: 0x7F58
STRING: 「...Please don't push yourself too hard.」

LABEL: 0x7F8C
STRING: 「It would be even more of a bother if you collapsed in a place like this.」

LABEL: 0x7FD1
STRING: Would any man be able to leave after hearing that?

LABEL: 0x8013
STRING: Damn it.

LABEL: 0x8029
STRING: Now that it had come to this, I couldn't leave until she said I was useful.

LABEL: 0x8095
STRING: 「I'm fine.」

LABEL: 0x80B3
STRING: I could feel my body slowly getting used to the cold as I spoke.

LABEL: 0x80E5
STRING: I calmed down and regained my composure to survey the area.

LABEL: 0x811B
STRING: The inside of the rescue ship was a small space about three tatami mats wide.

LABEL: 0x8153
STRING: There were two small round windows on the wall.

LABEL: 0x8189
STRING: That said, on the other side of the windows was complete darkness...

LABEL: 0x81C5
STRING: Even if I couldn't see anything, it reminded me that this was the deep sea.

LABEL: 0x8225
STRING: Shifting my gaze from the windows, I could see multiple gauges.

LABEL: 0x825B
STRING: They were similar to the ones in the wheelhouse of the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x82B6
STRING: However... they were all inactive.

LABEL: 0x8356
STRING: 「They're not on as you can see.」

LABEL: 0x83A1
STRING: 「Can I look around?」

LABEL: 0x83E6
STRING: 「Sure. Just don't touch anything carelessly.」

LABEL: 0x842B
STRING: Yukari warned me like I was one of the girls.

LABEL: 0x8461
STRING: I nodded vaguely and focused on the panels inside the ship.

LABEL: 0x84AF
STRING: As I got closer, I could see that they were much simpler than the ones in the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x8510
STRING: The model of the ship was old too.

LABEL: 0x8532
STRING: It looked like there were some parts that were over 10 years old mixed in as well.

LABEL: 0x8570
STRING: The parts were noticeably out of shape, similar to the ones I had used during my undergraduate assembly exercises. Could you really dive into the deep sea using this stuff...?

LABEL: 0x8656
STRING: 「Is there something bothering you?」

LABEL: 0x8695
STRING: 「Not really, no...」

LABEL: 0x86CB
STRING: 「The ship is just more old-fashioned than I thought.」

LABEL: 0x86F7
STRING: 「Doesn't ROMLES make a lot of money?」

LABEL: 0x8791
STRING: 「This rescue ship was repurposed from a traditional deep-sea submarine, so the equipment is somewhat outdated.」

LABEL: 0x87F7
STRING: 「That said, it should be well maintained.」

LABEL: 0x8838
STRING: 「I see.」

LABEL: 0x8852
STRING: I checked the gauges one by one.

LABEL: 0x8882
STRING: As Yukari had said, things didn't look that old aside from the model.

LABEL: 0x893D
STRING: But――

LABEL: 0x8955
STRING: At this size, the maximum number of occupants would be six, even when packed tightly together.

LABEL: 0x89A5
STRING: Or three people if you left some breathing room.

LABEL: 0x89D9
STRING: If you were to try to rescue 50 people with this ship...

LABEL: 0x8A13
STRING: You would need at least ten round trips.

LABEL: 0x8A3D
STRING: It wasn't big enough to be a rescue ship for a cruise submarine like the <SHEEP III>, right?

LABEL: 0x8A94
STRING: Well, they probably didn't expect such a huge submarine to sink in the first place...

LABEL: 0x8BB5
STRING: 「...There's a rescue hatch in the rear section, too.」

LABEL: 0x8BF9
STRING: 「Did you know there's a storeroom in there, above the observation deck?」

LABEL: 0x8C4A
STRING: I didn't.

LABEL: 0x8C68
STRING: Was it different from the one on the first floor?

LABEL: 0x8C9A
STRING: 「Wasn't the warehouse on the first floor?」

LABEL: 0x8D36
STRING: 「That's the stock we keep on hand.」

LABEL: 0x8D68
STRING: 「Naturally, food, water, and other necessities need to be resupplied.」

LABEL: 0x8DB8
STRING: 「We keep those things near the entrance so they can be brought in quickly.」

LABEL: 0x8E15
STRING: Near the entrance... Come to think of it, when boarding the <SHEEP III>, we entered from the second and third floors of the rear section.

LABEL: 0x8E78
STRING: The bright atmosphere from back then was nowhere to be found now.

LABEL: 0x8F2E
STRING: 「Therefore, rescue is possible from two locations.」

LABEL: 0x8FCD
STRING: 「At this point, we can only use one, but...」

LABEL: 0x9003
STRING: 「If there had been only that one entrance, the rescue team wouldn't have been able to get in――」

LABEL: 0x906E
STRING: ...Then.

LABEL: 0x9084
STRING: A gauge lamp suddenly lit up.

LABEL: 0x911E
STRING: 「...Did you touch something?」

LABEL: 0x916F
STRING: I hadn't touched anything.

LABEL: 0x918F
STRING: I wasn't trying to talk my way out of it. I hadn't done anything.

LABEL: 0x91BF
STRING: Something had turned on despite that...

LABEL: 0x91F3
STRING: Then, a possibility suddenly came to my mind.

LABEL: 0x9229
STRING: 「Hey, this...」

LABEL: 0x9249
STRING: 「Could it be that it just wasn't turned on?」

LABEL: 0x92FF
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x931A
STRING: Yukari's expression disappeared.

LABEL: 0x9340
STRING: It wasn't because she put on a straight face, however, but rather that she was surprised.

LABEL: 0x938C
STRING: Could it be...?

LABEL: 0x93A4
STRING: Had... she really not checked?

LABEL: 0x9433
STRING: After a moment, she blushed.

LABEL: 0x94AF
STRING: There was nothing more to say.

LABEL: 0x94D3
STRING: This was the second time, huh?

LABEL: 0x94EB
STRING: The second time.

LABEL: 0x9505
STRING: She was lacking in some respects, as I thought.

LABEL: 0x952D
STRING: Regretfully, this wasn't the time to call her cute.

LABEL: 0x9581
STRING: I turned away from Yukari and checked the gauges.

LABEL: 0x95D5
STRING: 「I think this ship will work just fine now.」

LABEL: 0x9618
STRING: 「R-Really?」

LABEL: 0x963F
STRING: 「I don't really know how to operate it.」

LABEL: 0x966F
STRING: 「And I don't think there's a manual anywhere around here.」

LABEL: 0x96C7
STRING: 「However, you said you'd been on a submarine like this before, right...?」

LABEL: 0x96FF
STRING: I glanced at Yukari.

LABEL: 0x971F
STRING: She was frozen in place with a dumbfounded expression and turned serious as if she had realized something.

LABEL: 0x97DD
STRING: 「I-I'll give it a try.」

LABEL: 0x9804
STRING: 「Please do.」

LABEL: 0x983C
STRING: With that, she settled back into the spot where she had been sitting earlier.

LABEL: 0x9882
STRING: ――At that moment...

LABEL: 0x98AF
STRING: 「Heey!」

LABEL: 0x98C7
STRING: 「What's going on?」

LABEL: 0x98EC
STRING: I heard Hiragino's voice from below.

LABEL: 0x9986
STRING: 「Please go to Hiragino-sensei.」

LABEL: 0x99C0
STRING: 「You can leave the rest to me.」

LABEL: 0x99F5
STRING: 「Got it... Sorry, Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0x9A3F
STRING: Leaving her inside the rescue ship, I passed through the hatch and entered the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x9ADE
STRING: Hiragino was waiting for me there.

LABEL: 0x9C14
STRING: 「It seemed like you were taking your time... So, will it move?」

LABEL: 0x9C63
STRING: 「Yeah, it looks like it'll work out better than I thought.」

LABEL: 0x9C99
STRING: 「It's up to Yukari-san now, but we should be able to make use of it.」

LABEL: 0x9D3B
STRING: 「That's good!」

LABEL: 0x9D5A
STRING: He smiled.

LABEL: 0x9D7E
STRING: He seemed to have recovered a bit and his complexion looked better.

LABEL: 0x9DBC
STRING: 「Oh, right. She's doing her best inside the rescue ship, so why don't you go and give her a hand?」

LABEL: 0x9E19
STRING: 「Good idea. Well, not that I think there's much I can do...」

LABEL: 0x9E78
STRING: He put his foot on the entrance to the pressurization room as he spoke.

LABEL: 0x9EB4
STRING: 「Ah, Hiragino-san...」

LABEL: 0x9F3E
STRING: 「Hm?」

LABEL: 0x9F59
STRING: Thinking of something, I tossed a spare doctor's coat to him.

LABEL: 0x9FAB
STRING: 「It's pretty cold inside.」

LABEL: 0x9FCF
STRING: 「Give that to Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0xA00D
STRING: After Hiragino left, I was left alone in the emergency room.

LABEL: 0xA053
STRING: What would become of the rescue ship...?

LABEL: 0xA083
STRING: Could we really escape? And what about the other two?

LABEL: 0xA0D5
STRING: Where had Touri gone?

LABEL: 0xA101
STRING: ――I didn't know.

LABEL: 0xA11F
STRING: For now, let's go get Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0xA14F
STRING: I set off for the research room.
